title: Seer
description: Each night, choose a player and learn if they are a Townsfolk, a Vampire, or a Werewolf.
rules: During each **nighttime phase**, you will be asked to choose a player in Slack and send it to the Werewolf team.
You will be told if that player is a Townsfolk, a Vampire, or a Werewolf.
If that player is a Cultist, they will read as a Townsfolk.
tips: Find the Apprentice Seer and share information with them as soon as you can—just in case.

title: Apprentice Seer
description: You become Seer when the Seer dies.
rules: You will receive **no** information until the Seer dies.
tips: Find the Seer and share information with them as soon as you can—just in case.
